name: HardCore Marshmallow
description:
This game is currently in development and this is an early access version!

===========================================================

How to play :

  • Click the left mouse button to make the player fly up.
  • player can safe cross the ring when it has the same color as player
  • Eat the candy will change player's color
  • Only when  4 kinds of flying monster above the player's mouse, player can  eat them, and get their corresponding ability, and ability will last 10 seconds.
  • The 4 kinds of monsters are ghost, clock turtle, iron rocket, yellow fish.But be careful when they touch you, they will hurt you.
  • Eat ghost will make you safe cross anything, monster can't hurt you.
  • Eat clock turtle will make everything slow down except you.
  • Eat iron rocket will make you as hard as iron, when you touch the monster you can kill them, and the ring with different color won't hurt you but it will block you out.
  • Eat yellow fish will add half point of HP.

what's different between android and HTML5 in this game?

  • In android you can get daily reward.
  • In android version you can spend 20 candies to reborn when you are dead.
  • In android you can save the highest score and compared with the global player.

===========================================================

Wish you can like it!

Have fun!
